actions.committee: House Committee on Banking, Currency and Housing
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Banking, Currency and Housing.

official_title: A bill to establish in the Department of Housing and Urban Development a direct low-interest loan program to assist homeowners and other owners of residential structures in purchasing and installing more effective insulation and heating equipment.

summary.text: Homeowners' Energy Conservation Act - Establishes in the Department of Housing and Urban Development a direct low-interest loan program to assist owners of residential structures in purchasing and installing more effective insulation and heating equipment. Authorizes the appropriation of such sums as are necessary to carry out this Act.

titles.title: A bill to establish in the Department of Housing and Urban Development a direct low-interest loan program to assist homeowners and other owners of residential structures in purchasing and installing more effective insulation and heating equipment.
